Posts.Content: vivirasselena wrote: My "rash" across my radiated chest has exploded into shingles, putting my treatment off for a week.  the stress of the radiation has just blown this excruciating side effect up!  This SE has without a doubt, been the WORST THING I HAVE EVER FELT. GIve me 8 more weeks of chemo rather than a chest full of burned skin WITH shingles.  Good Lord in Heaven, have mercy! If you're feeling itchy, blistered and just plaing miserable during your rads, it could be shingles. See a dermo...ASAP I am loved. I am safe. I am healed. Dx 11/12/2010, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: SHINGLES!!!!!!!!! vivirasselena gale1525

Posts.Content: vivirasselena wrote: it's been gently used.....but it's free to anyone facing surgery coming up. it's a Hannah 2860 with the inside pockets for your drains. Size medium...it'll fit a 34 to 36 b/c cup. please pm me and I'll happily forward it to anyone who needs it. there's also a post surgery bra i'll give to you as well. Please let it go to someone without insurance who is in financial NEED.  thanks. I am loved. I am safe. I am healed. Dx 11/12/2010, IDC, 5cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 0/1 nodes, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
